name: Carnival Clicker
description:
Hello, this is Code Site here with a new game on itch.io.  This is a game inspired by teleporting machines through which stuff would be able to transport from one place to another. This is a game where you need to click on the archery board, it is a type of clicker game and could help you reduce stress ! The board goes to other place in the screen once you click it, for every time you click you get 20 seconds increase in your time, play with you friends and enjoy !  For more interesting games than this, you could help me or appreciate me by supporting me on itch.io itself or by subscribing my youtube channel! Thank you for downloading !  

Also check out my youtube channel if you want to create stuff and games ! 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCi-_S10BBD7g5ZKK9lsyMeA

My website :- https://codesitetechnologi.wixsite.com/codesitetech
